the hotel rixos premium belek has a beautiful and huge complex that is quality and very well maintained in fact there is no lack of servi with staff working around the clock to satisfy hotel guests the hotel also has an app that makes things easier and provides a good overview you will also be provided with an assistant who can be contacted via whatsapp and who will receive help center and support if you have any questions what surprised and pleased me personally what i did not see in any hotel to this extent were the sports activities of the exclusivesportclub there were a lot of sports things to do that were done by professional athletes there was something for everyone in these offers and you could also participate well as a sports cannon or sports amateur anywhere you were cordially invited not harassed but you could observe that the guests always came to it by themselves as it was really fun there were offers like zumba and aquazumba which was offered by salem who led his work with a lot of passion humor and his likeable nature for us to the unforgettable moments on holiday Abdullah saka gave us a great insight into cardio strength training and many workouts with his disciplined polite and professional manner we were very challenged and could learn a lot Kaan Barlas gave us insights into stand up paddle crossfit and other offers with his calm balanced and open nature which we enjoyed visiting and appreciated the exercises very much viktoriya a power woman gave us insights into aquapool dancing aquaboxing kangoroojump as well as many other offerings with we couldnt help but hop along bath towels are available indefinitely which you can change during the day the compartments for the bath towels are always filled unfortunately there were also guests in this hotel who reserved the loungers quite early nonetheless there was a large amount of reclining space and various reclining options every evening after the animation Show there was live music there were always other bands or singers performing the musicians sometimes involved the guests so the dance floor was always well attended unfortunately the music was often monotonous lacking the oriental flair that we missed in a hotel in turkey there was no response to requests in this regard hotel rixos premium belek kaliteli bakımlı devasa tesis sahip hizmet eksiklik yok misafir etmek gece gündüz çalış ayrı iş kolaylaştıran iyi genel bakış sağlayan uygula bulunmak ayrı whatsapp aracılığıyla iletiş geçebilecek herhangi sorun olur yardım destek alabilecek asistan sağlan kişisel ben şaşırtan
